title: New: Sun Glitters Ft. Steffaloo – Cosmic Oceans
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/tumblr_lja7kjhqvL1qav4gx_1302178808_cover.jpg "tumblr_lja7kjhqvL1qav4gx_1302178808_cover")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6416-new-sunglitters-ft-steffaloo-cosmic-oceans/attachment/tumblr_lja7kjhqvl1qav4gx_1302178808_cover)Having appeared on the pages of CitR only a few days ago in an Introducing article, Sun Glitters grace our website yet again. This time with their fantastic new single Cosmic Oceans, featuring the vocal talents of LA songstress Steffaloo. It’s a hazy, reverb filled affair, immersed with elements of My Bloody Valentine-esque shoegaze, yet mainting a downtempo, dubstep like, laid back vibe. Made available to listen to and download  via bandcamp, and a 12″ single in the near future, be sure not to miss Cosmic Oceans off your sound of summer 2011 playlists. cosmic oceans (feat. Steffaloo) by Sun Glitters
